Title: Provides for expanded non-medical in-home services, non-institutional respite services, case management services, and ancillary services without a prescription or physician's order; repealer
Summary: Provides for expanded non-medical in-home services, non-institutional respite services, case management services, and ancillary services without a prescription or physician's order; repeals certain cost sharing requirements for such services.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the elder law, in relation to the provision of expanded non-medical in-home services, non-institutional respite services, case management services, and ancillary services without a prescription or physician's order; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
